word: If the messengers who bear the last solemn warning to the world would pray . . . fervently and in faith, as did Jacob, they would find many places where they could say: "I have seen God face to face, and my life is preserved" (Genesis 32:30). They would be accounted of heaven as princes, having power to prevail with God and men.--The Great Controversy, pp. 620-622.
